text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Today marks the first day of summer<n>camp. To make the
most of our time,<n>I've gone ahead and started Daiwa<n>
Scarlet on beach runs.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant, pant... Haaah, aaagh...I'm sweating buckets...

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Let me take a quick breather!Sigh... Running on sand really tiresyou out.
choice_data_list:
But it'll also build up your muscles that much
more.

But it'll also build up your muscles that much
more.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
If it didn't, I'd have some choice<n>words for you. I'm not
trying to waste<n>all my energy for no reason, you<n>know.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
If anything, I welcome a hurdle or two.<n>Each obstacle I
overcome is another<n>step closer to being number one.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Okay, I'm done resting! Let's get<n>back to it.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She's caught her breath, but I can tell<n>her balance is a little
wobbly. Looks<n>like her legs are shaky, and I doubt<n>this
heat is doing her any favors<n>either.
choice_data_list: Let's call it here for today.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Huh? Were you even listening to me<n>just now?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
I said I welcome challenges! We're at<n>summer camp, so
isn't a tougher<n>schedule par for the course?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
If I complained about every little thing,<n>there's no way I
could become<n>number one!
choice_data_list: Even so, you shouldn't overwork yourself.
Even so, you shouldn't overwork yourself.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: I don't need you to tell me tha—aah?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Scarlet tries to take a step forward,<n>but her legs give way
beneath her.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Tch... I can't become number one if I<n>get exhausted this
easily. I have to do<n>m—
choice_data_list: Resting is also an essential part of training.
Resting is also an essential part of training.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Sigh. Fine, you win. I'll rest a bitmore, and then—
choice_data_list: We still got camp tomorrow too, you know?
We still got camp tomorrow too, you know?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Fine, fine. I'll listen to you this time.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
I mean, you are my trainer and all.<n>And I can't stand you
worrying about<n>me.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Geez. As soon as I'm back up to<n>snuff, we're making up
for lost<n>ground.
choice_data_list: I better not find you sneaking out to run, okay?
I better not find you sneaking out to run, okay?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Excuse me. I'm not a child, socould you not treat me like one?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
If we're done training, then I'm free<n>for the rest of the day,
right? See you.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With a slight wobble in her gait, she<n>starts heading back to
the dorm.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Later in the evening, I decide to go<n>check up on Scarlet. In
the dorm<n>hallway, an unfamiliar student comes<n>up to me.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Oh hey, you're Scarlet's trainer. Are<n>you looking for her?

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
I don't think she's in her room. I just<n>saw her heading
towards the<n>entrance.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She was pretty beat after today's<n>training... Is she going to
be okay<n>walking around by herself?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Oh, if it isn't my trainer? What's that<n>look on your face for?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: I was about to go for a walk an—
choice_data_list: I'm coming too!
I'm coming too!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: I-I don't mind... But, what're you<n>getting so worked up for?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Don't tell me—you're worried I'll<n>sneak in some training
again...
choice_data_list:
You were a little unsteady this afternoon, so I
just want to be sure.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Ah, so that's why. Don't worry, I<n>took a relaxing bath
followed by a nice<n>nap.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Like you said, we have training<n>tomorrow too. I wouldn't
want to<n>overdo it today and feel dead<n>tomorrow.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
But I've got to say... You really are a<n>worrywart. You know,
at first I thought<n>you just didn't trust me.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
How about this? I'll prove to you that<n>I'm full of energy and
feeling perfectly<n>fine!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Daiwa Scarlet insists on leading the<n>way, so I follow along
beside<n>her—when suddenly—lively festival<n>music starts
playing nearby...

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
I heard there was a festival going on<n>nearby, so I was just
about to go and<n>check it out. Hey, don't all these<n>delicious
smells make you hungry?
choice_data_list: Looks like your appetite's just fine, too.
Looks like your appetite's just fine, too.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Of course it is! A happy stomach is<n>key to a happy me.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Come on, let's go buy out the food<n>stalls! Oh, but before
that—let's have<n>some fun!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After taking in the festival, we load up<n>on food and head to
the beach.<n>Yakisoba, takoyaki, shaved ice, cotton<n>
candy—we devour them one after the<n>other.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Mmm, that hit the spot! Yum, yum! ♪
choice_data_list: I'm glad you're having a good time.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Hey, didn't I tell you earlier? Stop<n>being such a worrywart
already.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Okay, I did overwork myself that one<n>time, but now I'm not
alone, so...

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: A-anyways that's how it is, so I'm<n>fine now! Got it?!
choice_data_list: Thanks for counting on me.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: I didn't say it was you I wastalking about, did I?!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
It's just, you are a pro trainer... So I<n>thought it'd be okay to
leave the<n>training stuff to you, nothing else.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
B-basically, you better take<n>responsibility for what you
promised!<n>You're the one who said, "Let's<n>become
number one together."
choice_data_list: Just leave it to me!
Just leave it to me!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: And there you go, getting all carried<n>away.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
I'll be way more prepared for<n>tomorrow's training, so you
better not<n>fall behind either!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: I will become number one—but I can't<n>do it alone.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
That's why... you need to keep up<n>with me and become the
number one<n>trainer too!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The next day, Daiwa Scarlet runs with<n>a newfound resolve
beneath the<n>shining sun, more dazzling than even<n>the
distant horizon.
